title: Fire Dragon Song - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient Times   Beast Companions   Childcare   Clan Building   Cold Love Interests   Cooking   Cute Children   Doting Love Interests   Heartwarming   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Knowledge   Mpreg   Power Couple   Pregnancy   Shapeshifters   Transmigration   Tribal Society   Unconditional Love
author: Neleta
description:
When the crimson fire fell from the sky,

The stagnant lake in Zhao Yunxiao heart, rippled.

His wishes were very small,

To have someone to love and adore him,

The beast that slayed the dragon rekindled his hope.

Tuzo,

An evil son driven out of his tribe;

His wishes were very small,

That there would be one who would not fear him, not be afraid of him and love him.

Could this 'female', who came from nowhere, be his only one?>
